-1.title: The Twisted Mind of Ray Hinkley
-1.plot: Ray Hinkley is an engineer, he is your neighbor, he is the unassuming man standing next to you in line at the grocery store...and he has murdered five people in the past year. Travel inside the mind of a serial killer as Ray offers a first person account of his daily life. Listen to his story, and see how a perfect storm of events from his past transformed him into the man he is today. Watch as Ray documents his exploits and hold your breath for the disturbing finish that is Ray's final show stealing coup de grace!

1.title: The Possession of Sara Cross
1.plot: Young Sara ran away from home to live with her boyfriend Justin. Growing up in a strict, conservative Catholic household, she often argued and had physical altercations with her parents. Sara is also schizophrenic. Although never formally diagnosed, she undergoes a series of what she terms 'blackouts' where she mentally disappears into an altered state. These 'blackouts' have been occurring much more frequently and is debilitating to her normal life. With no insurance and no money, she decides to create a video diary to gather support from the online community. What ...

imdb.plot outline: From the writer/director of Lionsgate's KNOCK KNOCK 2, comes uscream.tv, the brand new channel for everything paranormal and supernatural. Each web series centers on a single character as they undergo a unique sense of self discovery. As a whole, uscream.tv will offer an anthology of characters each telling their own stories of how they came to be and subsequently, how they manage to survive in everyday society.
imdb.title: uscream.tv
plot: From the writer/director of Lionsgate's KNOCK KNOCK 2, comes _uscream.tv_ (qv), the brand new channel for everything paranormal and supernatural. Each web series centers on a single character as they undergo a unique sense of self discovery. As a whole, _uscream.tv_ (qv) will offer an anthology of characters each telling their own stories of how they came to be and subsequently, how they manage to survive in everyday society.::Chris Sheng
